com.nokia.maps.map

Class MapCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.microedition.lcdui.Displayable
      • javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
        • com.nokia.maps.map.MapCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GestureMapCanvas

    public abstract class MapCanvas
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
implements MapListener
    This class offers an abstract base class for providing a method of showing map content on a Canvas. In addition to drawing, the following default functionality also is implemented:
    • zoom bar displaying current zoom level,
    • keys '*' and '#' are mapped for zooming,
    • navigation keys (game actions UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT) are mapped for panning,
    • default cursor.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Reference to MIDlet's display.
      protected MapDisplay map
      This property holds a reference to the MapDisplay that is rendered.
      protected MapFactory mapFactory
      This property holds a reference to MapFactory used to create MapDisplay.

      • MapCanvas

        public MapCanvas(javax.microedition.lcdui.Display display,
         int resolution)
        Creates new MapCanvas with default map behavior.
        Parameters:
        display - display object for the current MIDlet
        resolution - the tile resolution, either one of MapDisplay.MAP_RESOLUTION_AUTO, MapDisplay.MAP_RESOLUTION_128_x_128 or MapDisplay.MAP_RESOLUTION_256_x_256

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        protected void paint(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g)
        This method should not be derived or used directly. It implements a method defined in Canvas class which is called by the system. Repainting MapCanvas must be done using repaint() method defined in Canvas. This method renders MapDisplay and all MapComponents added to MapDisplay.
        Specified by:
        paint in class javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
        Parameters:
        g - graphics to paint on
        See Also:
        Canvas.paint(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics)

      • keyPressed

        protected void keyPressed(int key)
        This method is an implementation of a interface defined in the Canvas class to enable key event handling in MapComponent. This method is not intended for derivation and the recommended way to add custom event handling is to implement an EventListener and provide it from MapComponent.
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
        Parameters:
        key -
        See Also:
        Canvas.keyPressed(int)

      • onMapUpdateError

        public abstract void onMapUpdateError(java.lang.String description,
                    java.lang.Throwable detail,
                    boolean critical)
        This method is called when an error has occurred during map rendering
        Specified by:
        onMapUpdateError in interface MapListener
        Parameters:
        description - short description of the error
        detail - the error occurred
        critical - true if the background worker cannot handle the error situation and continue execution, false if the error is potentially recoverable.
        See Also:
        MapListener

      • sizeChanged

        protected void sizeChanged(int w,
               int h)
        This method is not intended to be derived. It implements method defined in the Canvas class and changes size of the associated MapDisplay and repaints whole Canvas area.
        Overrides:
        sizeChanged in class javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
